name: Runic Mines
description:
Description: Break And Build Your Way Through The Mine

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Left Mouse to Attack
  • Right Mouse to Build
  • E to Select Next Level at the end of a level
  • Tab to Select Main Menu at the end of a level

Controller Controls:

Note: (Main Menu still need to be navigated with a mouse)

  • Left Stick to move
  • A to Jump
  • X to Attack
  • Y Mouse to Build
  • A to Select Next Level at the end of a level
  • B to Select Main Menu at the end of a level

Credits:

Programing & Art by: KR34T1VE 

Dwarf Sprite Pack by: Elthen https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/pixel-art-dwarf-sprites Note: (I changed the sprite to a hammer to fit the game)

Music by: xDeviruchi https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack
